item.description:
If I had known the showtimes sooner for Oslo, August 31st, I would have scheduled it with more advance notice. I’ve heard some intriguing reviews of the movie, all of them glowing. I’m a little bit sorry that I read so many of them because one of them might have given the ending away. If you want to find out more about Oslo, August 31st, I would suggest watching the trailer at the theater’s website and not reading any reviews past the first paragraph or so!

I will purchase my ticket at around 4:30 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby between 4:30 and 5:00 p.m. Look for me and my red backpack. At about 5:00, I will move into the theater auditorium. You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 5:20 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the red backpack.

If we decide to go out after the movie, be prepared to add 25% to the cost of your order for both the tax and the tip. Restaurants in the area add the gratuity to the check automatically. Bring CASH to make division of the check easier.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event.

Marianne
﻿
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Oslo, August 31st (Norwegian movie)
